column2: select yearId as year, playerId, sum(hr) as numHR   from baseball.batting   group by yearId, playerId ), hrs_ranked as ( select year, playerId, numHr   ,      rank() over (partition by year order by numHR desc) as rank   from hrs ) select hr.year, hr.numHr,p.nameFIrst, p.nameLast , rank   from hrs_ranked hr   join baseball.players p on p.playerid=hr.playerid  where rank <=#  order by # desc,# desc
